Encounter.Name: Contact Corsairs
Encounter.DescriptionText: You hail the corsair captain. After a few short moments a crackling voice comes over the subspace communicator:

Message.Text: Hello SING, how can we help you in this fine day?

Response.Text: Tell them you want the Protection Contract off and you are going to kill them.

Message.Text: OK then. If you insist losing your freighters. We'll see you around, soon.
Thank you, we will contact you later.
